overview:
Gareth has been bringing exciting products to market for over 15 years.

Gareth was previously a member of the Skype executive team as the General Manager for the global Mobile and Hardware Devices division. He joined Skype in 2005 before the eBay acquisition and built the team that introduced Skype for iPhone, Sony PSP, Philips Cordless Phone, Netgear Wifi Phone and other mobile handsets.

Prior to Skype Gareth ran marketing for Red Hatâ€™s core product Red Hat Enterprise Linux.

Gareth has a degree in Electrical Engineering from the University of Waterloo and an MBA from Columbia Business School.

relationships.title: General Manager, Mobile and Hardware Devices
